parameters.name: AcceleratorId
parameters.description: The ID of the basic GA instance.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description:
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

You can use the client to generate the value, but you must make sure that it is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters.

>  If you do not specify this parameter, the system uses **RequestId** as **ClientToken**. **RequestId** may be different for each API request.

parameters.name: IpSetId
parameters.description: The ID of the acceleration region.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the GA instance is deployed. Set the value to **cn-hangzhou**.
